#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;

int sum(int n)
{
	int a=0;
	while(n)
	{
		a+=n%10;
		n/=10;
	}
	return a;
}
int main ()
{
	int t,n,s,i;
	sc(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		sc(n);
		s=0;
		i=1;
		while(n)
		{
			i*=5;
			if(n&1)
			{
				s+=i;
			}
			n>>=1;
		}
		pf(s);
	}
	return 0;
}
